Subject: ANJI v1.0 Released
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=183620858
X-Yahoo-Profile: blue5432

Well, we're finally releasing ANJI (Another NEAT Java Implementation),
version 1.0.

Sorry to say there's no handy GUI, but hopefully you'll find it
reasonably well-designed and documented.

You can visit our main site here:

http://anji.sourceforge.net

Or download the distribution directly from here:

https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=101005

The Documents section of our website has links to a Quick Start, the
API Specifications, and an explanation of the parameters, with
recommended settings.

Ken...could you go ahead and add a link from the NEAT FAQ and other
relevant locations?  (Of course, you might want to put the caveat that
it doesn't work *exactly* like NEAT.) ;)

We look forward to anyone who uses the implementation and might wish
to contribute to helping improve future versions.  At the very least,
we wouldn't mind using you guys as guinea pigs to just download it and
give it a spin, then offer any feedback.

Derek
